import React from "react"; import { Button, Container, Image, List, Grid, Segment, Header, Divider, Step, Form, Table, Icon, Modal } from "semantic-ui-react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Login from "./Login" import Register from "./Register"; const steps = [ { key: 'unite', icon: 'group', title: 'Unite.', description: 'Create or find your community.', }, { key: 'act', icon: 'bullhorn', title: 'Act.', description: 'Lead with your actions.', }, { key: 'grow', icon: 'handshake outline', title: 'Grow.', description: 'Grow with others as they match your actions.' }, ] const Landing = (props) => { const [openLogin, setOpenLogin] = React.useState(false) const [openRegister, setOpenRegister] = React.useState(false) return (

We help you find your community.

setOpenLogin(false)} onOpen={() => setOpenLogin(true)} open={openLogin} trigger={ */} ) } export default Landing;
